text: وَكَم مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَا فَجَآءَهَا بَأْسُنَا بَيَـٰتًا أَوْ هُمْ قَآئِلُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And how many cities have We destroyed, and Our punishment came to them at night or while they were sleeping at noon.
translation.id.indonesian: Betapa banyaknya negeri yang telah Kami binasakan, maka datanglah siksaan Kami (menimpa penduduk)nya di waktu mereka berada di malam hari, atau di waktu mereka beristirahat di tengah hari.
